meanings.definition: A removable protective cover for a book.
meanings.sent1: I always use dustcovers to protect my favorite books.
meanings.sent2: The library provides dustcovers to keep the books clean.
meanings.sent3: The dustcovers on the books were like little jackets, keeping them safe.
meanings.sent4: Her love for books was so strong that she saw dustcovers as shields for her treasures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dustcovers made the books look even more inviting.

meanings.definition: To cover with a removable protective cover.
meanings.sent1: She carefully dustcovers her books to prevent damage.
meanings.sent2: Remember to dustcovers your textbooks before storing them.
meanings.sent3: He decided to dustcovers his laptop to shield it from spills.
meanings.sent4: The painter dustcovers the furniture before starting work.
meanings.sent5: The gardener dustcovers the delicate plants during the storm.

meanings.definition: The act of covering with a removable protective cover.
meanings.sent1: The dustcovers of the books were done with care.
meanings.sent2: His job at the bookstore involved applying dustcovers to new arrivals.
meanings.sent3: The dustcovers of the old magazines were worn but still functional.
meanings.sent4: The team's task for the day was to complete the dustcovers of all the books.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with the sound of rustling dustcovers being put on the textbooks.
